{{Lang|'''Gorou'''|ja=ゴロー|ja_rm=Goroo}} is a playable {{Geo}} [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

He is a general of the [[Watatsumi Army]]. Courageous and reliable, his men know they can place their trust in him both on and off of the battlefield.
